result.arabic_text: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ
result.translation: 190. Moominiiney Qeb Siinit Aba maray koroositet Qeb Aba Yallih gital Angacalluk Yallih Qangara fayya ittamkeh, Qeb keenit Abtaanamal caddok matatrina urruu kee Agabuy Qidim как xiqe waa Qiddaanamal, Diggah Yalli caddok tatra mara makicnik.
